medical_history.chief_complaint: Preimplantation genetic diagnosis (PGD) for early-onset Alzheimer disease due to V717L mutation.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient is a 30-year-old woman asymptomatic for Alzheimer's disease (AD). Her sister developed symptoms of AD at age 38, and their father had significant psychological and memory issues before dying at age 42. One brother has shown mild memory problems since age 35.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient carries the V717L mutation associated with early-onset Alzheimer's but shows no symptoms.
medical_history.family_history: The patient has a sister with AD symptoms, a brother with early memory problems, and a father who had memory issues and passed away at a young age.
